title: Quilt Piece, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave with herringbone diagonal borders
description: Piece of a quilted bedcover with right and bottom edges cut. Quilt top is made of four widths stitched together. Design has offset rows of a floral medallion enclosed in a fine vine in blue on a yellow background. Running stitch using cotton thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt Piece, 1800–50.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave with herringbone diagonal borders. 1975-44-2.
